ComicInfo.Summary:
In 1191, Robin of Locksley returns from the Holy Land to an England he barely recognises…and so he takes matters into his own hands, with brutal and sadistic results. And so the Merry Men are born…
Never-before-seen mysteries confront Everard Blackthorne, the Sheriff of Nottingham, culminating in an investigation that will lead directly into the climactic events of Nottingham Vol. 3.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-13 12:32:48. [CVDB997794]
